title: Chicken pad Thai
ingredients: ['285g rice noodles', '120ml fish sauce', '80ml soy sauce', '5 tablespoons tamarind paste', '4 tablespoons brown soft sugar', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '350g chicken, thinly sliced', '180g firm tofu, sliced', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon shrimp paste', '3 eggs', '2 tablespoons chopped spring onion', '100g roasted peanuts', '150g beansprouts', '1 lime, cut into wedges']
